contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|trump}} '''[[Trump]]''' or trumps is a subset of the cards in many trick-taking games. '''Trump''' may also refer to: * [[Trump (surname)]], list of persons with the name * [[The Trump Organization]], a business conglomerate led by Donald Trump * [[The Trump (horse)]], Australian thoroughbred racehorse born 1932 * [[HMS Trump (P333)|HMS ''Trump'' (P333)]], a British submarine, 1944â€“1969 * [[Trump (magazine)|''Trump'' (magazine)]], published by Hugh Hefner in 1957 * [[Trump (comics)]], character in the Marvel Universe from 1984 * Warden Trump, character in the 2006 video game ''[[Dragon Quest Monsters: Joker]]'' * [[Jew's harp]], a small musical instrument played in the mouth * [[Trumpet]], a brass instrument, or the sound it makes ==Cards== * [[Trumps (Tarot cards)]], special cards in the Tarot pack * [[Court piece]], a variant of the game whist, originally from Iran * [[Top Trumps]], thematic packs of cards with numerical data used in a game with the same name ==See also== * [[Trumped (disambiguation)]] * [[Trump Tower (disambiguation)]] * {{lookfrom|Trump}} * {{intitle|Trump}} {{disambiguation}}
